full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA GA-YANG 'GUGS CHO GA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES RTA GA-YANG GUGS CHO GA 'DI NI YUL MI RNAMS RTA'I GA-YANG SHING TU NYAMS NAS NYAM THAG PA LA, BLA MA SEN BYAMS PA'I SEMS KUN NAS BSLANGS STE THA SHAL SMYON PA'I SPYOD YUL SU MA TI KARMA MING CAN GYIS ^ SLOB DPON CHEN PO PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYI GA-YANG KHUG SOGS LA GZHI BYAS NAS 'PHRAL DU BRIS PA'O, ,'DI LA NOR 'KHRUL BYUNG NAS MKHAS PA RNAMS LA CHAGS SO, ,BDAG LA SGRIB PA MI 'BYUNG BYUNG BAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NAS DGE BAS 'GRO KUN DBUL BA'I SDUG BSNGAL TANG BRAL NAS MYUR DU BDAG PA'I ZHING KHAMS SU SKYES PAR RGYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
